title: Houdini 9.0.794 Final 32 bit
description:
Side Effects Software is pleased to announce the launch of Houdini 9 9.0.794
32bit, the FINAL edition. The new User Interface is easier to learn and 
designed to match the UI standards of the CG industry. Now for the first 
time ever, self-taught, Houdini rookies will be able to work with the software 
right out of the box and be productive much faster than ever before. The 
Houdini 9 user interface features an icon-based shelf which makes it easier 
for artists to find tools then work in the 3D viewport and Pane tabs that let
you layer different types of panes. New selection modes facilitate quicker 
navigation between different parts of Houdini as you select geometry, 
particles or dynamic objects in your 3D scene.

[IMG]http://i236.photobucket.com/albums/ff230/Electronburn/Houdini.jpg[/IMG]
